snippet.title: Robowars Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Robowars allows you to immerse yourself in the world of the future, where the clash between the uncompromising great superpower and planetary corporation continues. Become a hero in this military action-thriller and change the very course of history!

Features:
Beautiful 3D-graphics
A fascinating story in the genre of a political thriller
Dozens of missions, hundreds of jobs, and tactical combinations
A wide selection of units, towers, super-hits and traps

Now available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/285090
